metadata.status: Initial extraction from Phase 1 - requires expansion from FBI Vault and Paperless documents

personnel.name: Louis Freeh

continuum_relevance.context: Private investigator for Maxwell defense team
continuum_relevance.activity: Conducted investigation of Bill Clinton-Epstein allegations
continuum_relevance.finding: Concluded Clinton was not present on Little St. James Island 2001-2003
continuum_relevance.methodology: Reviewed Secret Service documentation, found total absence of required logs/vouchers

personnel.significance: Former FBI Director applying FBI investigative methodology in private capacity; exculpatory finding
personnel.notes: Report commissioned by Maxwell defense; full report details not fully public

personnel.name: Jason Richards

continuum_relevance.context: Contacted by Virginia Giuffre regarding Ron Eppinger
continuum_relevance.response: Advised Giuffre to file Freedom of Information Act request

personnel.significance: Demonstrates FBI-witness interaction protocol; FBI contact 5 years before Epstein arrest
research_questions: Was FBI actively investigating Epstein network in 2014?
Who is Ron Eppinger and why did Giuffre contact FBI about him?
Did FBI follow up on Giuffre's contact?
What was Richards' role in FBI Epstein investigations?

personnel.name: J. Edgar Hoover

continuum_relevance.allegation: Published accounts claim Hoover attended parties at Plaza Hotel with Cohn

personnel.significance: Potential FBI Director compromise via blackmail; historical FBI accountability gaps; Church Committee documented Hoover-era abuses
research_questions: What do FBI files on Roy Cohn contain?
Did Hoover's relationship with Cohn affect FBI operations?
Were there FBI investigations into Cohn's activities that Hoover suppressed?
Are there Church Committee findings on Hoover-Cohn relationship?
